title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text:
Nuclear Structure (Theoretical basis): Shell model and residual interaction, Deformed shell model, Rotational bands and the particle-rotor model, Fast nuclear rotation and the cranking model.Nuclear Structure (Experimental basis)
Heavy-ion fusion reaction, Formation and decay of compound nucleus, Nuclear
instrumentation and coincidence technique, gamma-ray spectroscopy of high-spin states, measurement of lifetimes of excited nuclear states.Exotic nuclei and Radioactive beams : Nuclear structure at extremes of stability, Drip-line physics : nuclear halos, nuclear skins, Neutron- and proton-rich nuclei; Radioactive Ion Beams : isotope separation on-line (ISOL) and in-flight fragment separation (IFS) experimental methods
